#define VERSION_TIMESTAMP "%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S"

00050 #define MARK_FILE_TRUNCATED(FH)           \
00051   ({ \
00052     (FH)->file_truncated = true; \
00053   })
00054 
00056 #define UNMARK_FILE_TRUNCATED(FH)           \
00057   ({ \
00058     (FH)->file_truncated = false; \
00059   })
00060 
00062 #define VERSION_FILENAME_P(NAME)          \
00063   (strchr ((NAME), VERSION_NAME_SPECIFIER_C) != NULL)
00064 
00066 #define WAS_FILE_TRUNCATED(FH) ((FH)->file_truncated)

00068 typedef struct version_item_def
00069 {
00070   time_t stamp;
00071   char *name;
00072   char *path;
00073   interval_tree intervals;
00074 } version_item;
00075 
00076 struct dirhtab_item_def
00077 {
00078   char *name;
00079   time_t stamp;
00080   long ino;
00081 };
00082 
00083 #define CLEAR_VERSION_ITEM(I) \
00084 {\
00085   I.stamp = 0; \
00086   if (I.name) free (I.name); \
00087   I.name = NULL; \
00088   if (I.path) free (I.path); \
00089   I.path = NULL; \
00090   if (I.intervals) interval_tree_destroy (I.intervals); \
00091   I.intervals = NULL; \
00092 }
